title: Bug 109718 - Large content in text item causes tips to be displayed in one line
description:
INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGE DOESN'T HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR USERS TO IDENTIFY THE ERROR. 42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT 42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER 42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTION 42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION 52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTRATE THE UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS 53. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put mouse on the text item

Expected Result: Tips should be displayed in the given format

Actual Result: Tips are displayed in one line.
OB: When a large content is put in a text item, the tips are displayed in one line.
EB: The tips should be displayed in the correct format, even when the content in the text item is large.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Save a large content in a text item.
2. Put the mouse on the text item.
